name: Night on the Lake
description:
You open your eyes to the starry night. You are alone on the side of a lake. 

Waking up in your canoe, you must decide how to spend the night: do you risk the paddling across the dark waters to head home? Or you do seek sanctuary within an abandon boathouse? The choice is yours to make - but beware. There's no telling what secrets this lake hides.
